@benjamin If I have tons of candidates, I'd use simple generic programming tasks as a first filter.

I see a severe issues with https://t.co/dNeDvPP7yM - phone numbers can be owned by different persons in short time. #apisberlin
@marcos_placona Yes, but depending on the provide this can be only a few weeks.
Putting every business unit behind and API greatly improves time to market for new features, but is a painful endeavor. #apisberlin
@marcos_placona the biggest problem are the pre-paid providers. They operate with a limited pool and want to assign unused numbers fast.
@marcos_placona Yeah, but you're a service provider, so there I don't see that as a another problem. No humans are attached to that numbers.
